model-value.desc: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive

persistent.desc: User cannot dismiss Dialog if clicking outside of it or hitting ESC key; Also, an app route change won't dismiss it

no-esc-dismiss.desc: User cannot dismiss Dialog by hitting ESC key; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

no-backdrop-dismiss.desc: User cannot dismiss Dialog by clicking outside of it; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

no-route-dismiss.desc: Changing route app won't dismiss Dialog; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set

auto-close.desc: Any click/tap inside of the dialog will close it

seamless.desc: Put Dialog into seamless mode; Does not use a backdrop so user is able to interact with the rest of the page too

full-width.desc: Dialog will try to render with same width as the window

full-height.desc: Dialog will try to render with same height as the window

position.desc: Stick dialog to one of the sides (top, right, bottom or left)

square.desc: Forces content to have squared borders

no-refocus.desc: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus

no-focus.desc: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets shown, do not switch focus on it

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model

show.desc: Emitted after component has triggered show()

before-show.desc: Emitted when component triggers show() but before it finishes doing it

hide.desc: Emitted after component has triggered hide()

before-hide.desc: Emitted when component triggers hide() but before it finishes doing it

shake.desc: Shakes up the Dialog in order to catch user's attention

escape-key.desc: Emitted when ESC key is pressed; Does not get emitted if Dialog is 'persistent' or it has 'no-esc-key' set

toggle.desc: Triggers component to toggle between show/hide

focus.desc: Focus dialog; if you have content with autofocus attribute, it will directly focus it
